document_metadata.title: Disconfirming Evidence Not Found - Epistemic Coherence Falsification Attempts

disconfirming_evidence_not_found.hypothesis_tested: H7.7-DNF-A: Contradictions superficial not substantive—competing truths represent measurement error, semantic differences, or tactical variations rather than material divergent realities, contradictions reconcilable through clarification not requiring organizational change, truths differ in framing not in substance
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.disconfirming_evidence_sought: Evidence that profitability truths within acceptable measurement error (CRM estimate vs delivery reality differ by <5% not 13-15%, difference explainable by estimate uncertainty not systematic bias, truths converge when measured precisely), evidence that customer counts reconcilable through definition clarification (counts differ semantically—'contractual customer' vs 'revenue-generating entity'—but reconcile when definition standardized, counts refer to same entities counted different ways not different entities), evidence that satisfaction truths alignable through data integration (external platform truth and internal measurement truth refer to same satisfaction construct measured different ways, truths reconcile when measurement methodologies aligned, Trustpilot 'consistently worse' reflects sample bias not population satisfaction deterioration), evidence that data quality dual standard explainable by tolerance bands (CRM data accurate within business-acceptable tolerance, 13-15% variance within risk appetite, data trusted because 'trusted enough' not because perfectly accurate), evidence that finance adjustment small refinement not material divergence (adjustment <5% of operational forecast, adjustment timing/communication gap not magnitude gap, operations and finance truths converge when adjustment clarified). Evidence that contradictions semantic artifacts (sales calls profitable deals 'good margin', finance calls same deals 'acceptable return', delivery calls same deals 'challenging profitability'—language differs but substance aligned, contradictions communication style not empirical divergence). Evidence touch tests show minimal disruption (forcing truth alignment requires modest clarification effort not organizational restructuring, single-truth establishment feasible through documentation and communication not requiring cultural change or authority redistribution).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.search_conducted: Searched for measurement error evidence: CRM profitability overstatement quantified 13-15% per Stage 7.3 (material not measurement error, systematic bias not random variance, delivery consistently discovers profitability worse than CRM not random over/under estimates), margin erosion Q1-Q3 2024 to -13%/-3% per Stage 5 from accumulated CRM-based decisions (real value destruction from truths divergence not benign measurement imprecision), walk away policy Q4 2024 needed because CRM truth insufficient for deal filtering (policy compensates for CRM inadequacy not measurement precision refinement). Searched for customer count reconcilability: Customer count ambiguity per Stage 7.2 persists (same customer multiple entries, customer definition varies, reconciliation not simple definition standardization but data cleanup and relationship mapping), no reconciliation project or owner documented per Stage 7.4 (orphaned domain, if reconciliation simple would have been done, orphaning indicates complexity or low priority), three CEO tenures without reconciliation (if reconcilable through clarification, one CEO would have clarified, persistence suggests substantive not semantic). Searched for satisfaction truth alignment: Trustpilot 'consistently worse' 2024 external truth per Stage 7.3, internal measurement absent per Stage 7.3, 7.4 (no internal truth to align with external, void not misalignment), brand claims 'Fanatical Support' while external deteriorates (brand-reality gap widening not narrowing from alignment efforts, satisfaction deterioration indicates real customer experience problem not measurement artifact). Searched for data quality tolerance explanation: CRM data simultaneously trusted for territory sizing and compensation while known 13-15% inaccurate per Stage 7.7 contradiction 4 (dual standard not tolerance band—data both decision-critical and unreliable, tolerance bands would have explicit thresholds and acceptance criteria documented, no such documentation), CRM data quality orphaned per Stage 7.4 (if tolerance band existed would have owner monitoring against thresholds). Searched for finance adjustment magnitude: Operations-finance misalignment per Stage 7.6 finance transformation opacity creates execution risk (misalignment material enough to distort execution, if adjustment small misalignment wouldn't create risk), adjustment methodology undocumented per Stage 7.2 (if adjustment small refinement methodology would be simple and documented, undocumented opacity suggests judgment-based material adjustment not mechanical small refinement). Searched for semantic artifact evidence: No evidence contradictions language differences only—profitability truths materially different (CRM overstates by quantified 13-15%, delivery discovers post-signature requiring walk away policy, material financial impact from divergence), customer counts operationally different (different functions use different counts for different purposes without reconciliation, counts affect decisions differently not just described differently), satisfaction truths structurally different (internal void vs external visibility creates fundamentally asymmetric information structure not semantic framing difference). Searched for touch test minimal disruption: Touch tests per contradiction analysis demonstrate major disruption from truth alignment (sales cycle slowing, compensation disputes, CRM cleanup, brand repositioning, authority arbitration, cultural change all required per touch test analysis), alignment feasibility uncertain not straightforward (three CEO tenures without alignment attempts suggests alignment difficult or organizationally undesired not simple but deferred).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.evidence_found: NONE DISCONFIRMING substantive contradiction finding. Contradictions MATERIAL not superficial: (1) Profitability truths diverge 13-15% quantified per Stage 7.3 (material magnitude, systematic bias not random error, value destruction from divergence evidenced in margin erosion Q1-Q3 2024 per Stage 5). (2) Customer counts diverge across contexts operationally not semantically (functional autonomy enables count divergence, counts used differently by different functions for different decisions, three CEO tenures without reconciliation indicates substantive gap not simple clarification need). (3) Satisfaction truths structurally different (internal measurement void vs external platform visibility creates information asymmetry, brand claim contradicts external reality, contradiction worsening from satisfaction deterioration 2024 not resolving through alignment). (4) Data quality dual standard substantive (CRM simultaneously decision-critical and known unreliable, no tolerance band documentation or ownership, dual standard persists enabling velocity while degrading decision quality per contradiction analysis). (5) Finance adjustment magnitude uncertain but material (operations-finance misalignment creates execution risk suggesting material divergence, adjustment opacity per Stage 7.2 suggests judgment-based not mechanical small refinement). Contradictions require organizational change to resolve: Touch tests demonstrate alignment disrupts velocity (sales slowing), autonomy (functional authority reduction), accountability (measurement forcing), coordination (infrastructure requirement), culture (autonomy-to-alignment shift)—disruptions major not minor indicating contradictions substantive requiring organizational restructuring not superficial requiring clarification only. Three CEO tenures without resolution: If contradictions superficial/reconcilable, one of three CEOs would have reconciled through clarification effort, persistence across CEOs demonstrates contradictions substantive and embedded not superficial and easily clarifiable.
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.conclusion: Contradictions SUBSTANTIVE not superficial. Profitability truths materially divergent (13-15%), customer counts operationally divergent (functional autonomy enabling ambiguity), satisfaction truths structurally asymmetric (void vs visibility), data quality dually standardized (trusted-and-doubted), finance-operations materially misaligned (execution risk from divergence). Contradictions not measurement error (systematic bias, value destruction, policy interventions all indicate material divergence). Contradictions not semantic differences (operational impacts demonstrate substance—margin erosion, territory misallocation, retention latency, decision quality degradation all result from contradictions). Contradictions not reconcilable through clarification alone (touch tests show major disruption required, three CEO tenures without reconciliation indicates complexity or organizational resistance, alignment requires cultural and structural change not communication improvement). No evidence contradictions within tolerance bands or acceptable variance—contradictions create material decision risks and value destruction demonstrating inadequacy for business purposes, tolerance would require explicit acceptance criteria and monitoring, both absent. Contradictions fundamental to organizational operation—organization functions through contradiction not despite it, contradictions serve purposes (velocity, autonomy, accountability avoidance) outweighing coherence benefits in organizational revealed preference. Hypothesis that contradictions superficial decisively refuted—contradictions substantive, material, structural, requiring organizational transformation to resolve not clarification to reconcile.

disconfirming_evidence_not_found.hypothesis_tested: H7.7-DNF-B: Contradictions actively being resolved—resolution initiatives underway across CEO tenure or recently launched, contradictions narrowing over time through systematic improvement, organizational commitment to coherence visible through resource allocation and executive priority, resolution roadmap exists with milestones and accountability
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.disconfirming_evidence_sought: Evidence of resolution initiatives launched (data governance committee established to address data quality contradictions systematically, satisfaction measurement infrastructure being built through NPS/CSAT pilot or full deployment, CRM data quality improvement program active with validation process implementation and accuracy targets, customer count reconciliation project underway with master data management initiative and canonical count establishment timeline, operations-finance forecast alignment process being implemented with reconciliation meetings and methodology documentation, coordination infrastructure being built through operating committee establishment or executive coordination protocols), evidence of resolution progress and contradiction narrowing (CRM profitability overstatement decreasing from historical 20%+ to current 13-15% indicating improvement trajectory, customer count ambiguity reducing through reconciliation progress with counts converging across systems, satisfaction measurement pilot expanding toward full deployment with baseline establishment and trend tracking beginning, finance adjustment being documented and communicated improving operations-finance alignment, delivery engaging earlier in sales cycle T1 vs T3 historically reducing profitability validation gap), evidence of organizational commitment to coherence (executive compensation tied to data quality metrics, Board data quality oversight committee monitoring contradiction resolution progress, budget allocated to contradiction resolution initiatives—data governance staffing, measurement infrastructure tools, CRM improvement projects, CEO priority list includes contradiction resolution explicitly with stated timeline and accountability assignments, consultant engagements focused on information architecture improvement), evidence of resolution roadmap (phased approach documented—Phase 1 governance establishment, Phase 2 measurement infrastructure, Phase 3 reconciliation processes, milestones defined with quarterly progress checkpoints, accountability clear with named executives owning resolution workstreams).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.search_conducted: Searched for resolution initiatives across all Stage 7 sub-stages: (1) Data governance establishment: Stage 7.1 H7.1-B documents governance VOID (no CDO hired, no data governance committee established, no stewardship roles created across three CEO tenures 2022-2025 per Stage 4.5 despite data quality issues documented Stage 7.2 profitability overstatement, Stage 7.3 satisfaction and quality issues, Stage 7.4 orphaned domains), search found NO data governance initiative. (2) Satisfaction measurement infrastructure: Stage 7.3, 7.4 document measurement ABSENCE continuing (satisfaction not measured systematically across three CEO tenures, measurement absence persists not reducing, Trustpilot 'consistently worse' 2024 indicates satisfaction deterioration without internal measurement catching deterioration early), search found NO satisfaction measurement initiative. (3) CRM data quality improvement: CRM profitability overstatement 13-15% per Stage 7.3 current not historical (overstatement continuing, no improvement trajectory visible, no validation process implementation documented), Stage 7.4 CRM accuracy orphaned (no owner for data quality), Stage 7.6 CRM entry velocity continues prioritizing speed over accuracy (data quality debt perpetuating), search found NO CRM data quality program. (4) Customer count reconciliation: Customer count ambiguity per Stage 7.2 persists indefinitely (no reconciliation project, no owner per Stage 7.4, ambiguity stable across three CEO tenures not narrowing), search found NO customer count reconciliation initiative. (5) Operations-finance forecast alignment: Operations-finance misalignment per Stage 7.6 persists (adjustment methodology undocumented per Stage 7.2, operations visibility of adjustment uncertain per Stage 7.5, sequential opacity continuing not improving toward collaborative alignment), search found NO forecast alignment process implementation. (6) Coordination infrastructure: Operating committee absent per Stage 4.1 continuing (coordination gap unaddressed across three CEO tenures, no systematic cross-functional information reconciliation forum established), search found NO operating committee or coordination mechanism building. Searched for contradiction narrowing evidence: (1) CRM overstatement stable not decreasing (13-15% current, no improvement trajectory documented or claimed, if narrowing would expect 'historically 20%, now 15%, targeting 10%'—pattern absent). (2) Satisfaction deterioration not improvement (Trustpilot 'consistently worse' 2024 per Stage 7.3, satisfaction gap between brand claim and reality worsening not narrowing from measurement or improvement initiatives). (3) Customer count ambiguity indefinite not reducing (no reconciliation progress, counts still divergent across contexts, three CEO tenures without convergence). (4) Finance adjustment opacity continuing (undocumented per Stage 7.2, operations visibility uncertain per Stage 7.5, no transparency improvement visible). (5) Data quality dual standard persisting (CRM still trusted-and-doubted simultaneously per Stage 7.7 contradiction 4, no movement toward single quality standard with validation). Searched for organizational commitment evidence: (1) No executive compensation tied to data quality metrics found (compensation structures not documented in analysis but data quality metrics absence per Stage 7.3, 7.4 means no data quality KPIs available for compensation, if commitment existed would expect data quality goals in executive objectives). (2) No Board data quality oversight committee found (Board awareness of contradictions uncertain per Stage 7.5, 7.7 uncertainty register, Board data quality governance absent not active). (3) No budget allocation to contradiction resolution visible (no data governance hiring, no measurement infrastructure projects, no CRM improvement programs across three CEO tenures—absence indicates no resource allocation to contradiction resolution). (4) No resolution roadmap documented or claimed (if roadmap existed would be in management presentations, strategic plans, Board materials—absence across analysis indicates no systematic resolution planning). Searched for partial resolution evidence: Walk away policy Q4 2024 per Stage 7.1 represents reactive intervention (CEO reviews deals post-signature, policy addresses deal profitability contradiction symptom not root cause—validation gap persists T0-T2, CEO intervention T5 reactive not proactive, policy doesn't establish systematic profitability truth validation pre-commitment), sales refresh Q3 2024 per Stage 4.5 represents personnel intervention (addresses sales performance not sales data quality processes, CRM overstatement persists as process problem after refresh). Neither represents systematic contradiction resolution initiative (both reactive interventions to consequences, neither addresses underlying information architecture contradictions causing problems).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.evidence_found: NONE DISCONFIRMING contradiction persistence finding. NO RESOLUTION INITIATIVES FOUND: Data governance void per Stage 7.1 H7.1-B persists across three CEO tenures 2022-2025 (no CDO, no committee, no stewardship roles established), satisfaction measurement absent per Stage 7.3, 7.4 continuing (measurement absence across CEO tenures, satisfaction deterioration 2024 without measurement catching early), CRM data quality orphaned and unimproved per Stage 7.3, 7.4, 7.6 (13-15% overstatement continuing, no validation process, no quality program, entry velocity over accuracy persisting), customer count reconciliation absent per Stage 7.2, 7.4 (ambiguity indefinite, no project, no owner, reconciliation not occurring), operations-finance alignment absent per Stage 7.2, 7.5, 7.6 (adjustment undocumented, operations visibility uncertain, misalignment continuing), operating committee absent per Stage 4.1 (coordination infrastructure gap unaddressed across CEO tenures, no systematic executive information reconciliation). NO CONTRADICTION NARROWING: CRM overstatement stable 13-15% (not improving from higher historical level toward target), satisfaction deterioration not improvement (Trustpilot worse 2024 indicates gap widening between brand and reality), customer count ambiguity indefinite (not reducing toward canonical count), finance adjustment opacity continuing (not moving toward transparency and collaboration), data quality dual standard persisting (CRM trusted-and-doubted simultaneously not moving toward single validated truth). NO ORGANIZATIONAL COMMITMENT VISIBLE: No executive compensation tied to data quality (data quality not in KPIs), no Board data quality oversight (Board contradiction awareness uncertain, no governance committee), no budget allocation to resolution (no hiring, no projects, no programs across three CEO tenures), no resolution roadmap (no phased approach, no milestones, no accountability assignments documented). Walk away policy Q4 2024 and sales refresh Q3 2024 reactive interventions not systematic resolution (both address consequences—margin erosion, sales performance—not causes—validation gaps, data quality processes, information architecture contradictions, neither establishes resolution infrastructure, initiatives, or roadmaps).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.conclusion: Contradictions NOT being actively resolved. Three CEO tenures 2022-2025 without resolution initiatives demonstrates institutional non-engagement—if resolution active, one of three CEOs would have established governance, measurement, reconciliation, or coordination infrastructure addressing contradictions systematically, absence across all three CEOs indicates contradictions accepted as organizational steady-state not temporary gaps awaiting correction. Contradictions stable or worsening not narrowing: CRM overstatement continuing without improvement trajectory, satisfaction deteriorating 2024 widening brand-reality gap, customer ambiguity indefinite without reconciliation progress, finance opacity persisting without transparency improvement, data quality dual standard continuing without validation establishment. Walk away policy and sales refresh reactive symptom management not proactive contradiction resolution: Policy addresses deal rejection post-signature not validation gap pre-commitment, refresh addresses personnel not data quality processes, neither creates systematic resolution capability, both compensate for contradictions rather than eliminating contradictions. No organizational commitment to coherence visible: No resource allocation (staffing, projects, programs), no executive accountability (no KPIs, no compensation tie, no roadmap ownership), no Board oversight (Board awareness uncertain, no governance committee), no resolution planning (no roadmap, no milestones, no phased approach). Hypothesis that contradictions being resolved decisively refuted—contradictions institutionally embedded and organizationally tolerated across three CEO tenures without systematic resolution engagement, contradictions serve organizational purposes (velocity, autonomy, accountability avoidance) apparently outweighing coherence benefits in organizational revealed preference, resolution not occurring because contradictions functional not dysfunctional in current organizational equilibrium.

disconfirming_evidence_not_found.hypothesis_tested: H7.7-DNF-C: Organization unaware of contradictions—contradictions exist but not known to leadership (executives/Board), leadership operates assuming coherence without recognizing competing truths, awareness would trigger resolution (contradictions persist from ignorance not acceptance), recent contradiction discovery beginning to trigger organizational response
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.disconfirming_evidence_sought: Evidence executives unaware of contradictions (executives surprised when contradictions surfaced in analysis or audit, no executive communications mentioning data quality issues or profitability estimate accuracy concerns or satisfaction measurement gaps, executives operate confidently on CRM data without caveating accuracy, executives present coherent single truth to Board without acknowledging contradictions or data limitations), evidence Board unaware of operational contradictions (Board materials present single coherent truth without data quality caveats, Board questions do not probe data accuracy or measurement gaps, Board unaware of CRM overstatement or satisfaction measurement absence or customer count ambiguity per Stage 7.5, 7.7 uncertainty register), evidence contradictions in domains executives don't see (contradictions buried in operational details below executive visibility level, contradictions between systems executives don't directly interact with, contradictions not surfacing in executive dashboards or reports), evidence awareness recent and response beginning (executives recently discovered contradictions triggering immediate action—data governance committee establishment announced, satisfaction measurement project just launched, CRM quality initiative just kicked off, contradictions recognized and resolution starting even if not yet complete, executive tone shifting from confident coherence to acknowledged limitations and improvement commitment). Evidence awareness would trigger resolution (historical pattern shows when leadership aware of problems they act quickly—other organizational issues resolved rapidly when CEO aware, contradictions different only because awareness absent not because awareness doesn't drive action, organizational capability for resolution exists awaiting awareness trigger).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.search_conducted: Searched for executive unawareness evidence: (1) Delivery knows CRM profitability gap through repeated T3 experience per Stage 7.6 latency map (delivery discovers every deal profitability 13-15% worse than CRM estimate, delivery executive awareness high from systematic repeated discovery pattern). (2) Walk away policy Q4 2024 per Stage 7.1 indicates CEO awareness of deal quality issues (policy reactive to margin erosion Q1-Q3 2024, CEO saw margin deterioration and established policy, suggests some CEO awareness deal profitability problematic even if CEO unaware of underlying CRM validation gap architecture). (3) Finance adjustment per Stage 7.2, 7.6 suggests CFO awareness operational forecasts require correction (CFO adjusts operations forecast for external guidance, adjustment implies CFO skepticism of operations accuracy or CFO conservatism, either way CFO aware operations and finance truths diverge even if adjustment methodology undocumented). (4) Customer success or operations executives likely aware satisfaction unmeasured (if these functions exist and claim customer focus per 'Fanatical Support' brand, leadership of these functions would know whether satisfaction measured, measurement absence difficult to be unaware of if function responsible for customer outcomes). Evidence indicates PARTIAL AWARENESS: Some executives know some contradictions (delivery knows profitability gap, CFO knows adjustment needed, CEO knows deal quality problematic per policy), awareness existence contradicts hypothesis that organization unaware. Searched for Board unawareness evidence: Board awareness uncertain per Stage 7.5 information asymmetry (Board operational data access uncertain, Board sees finance-filtered aggregates potentially masking operational contradictions per Stage 7.6 Board quarterly latency), Board awareness of data quality issues unknown per Stage 7.7 uncertainty register, but Board unawareness not proven (absence of evidence for Board awareness not evidence of absence, Board may be aware and tolerating contradictions or Board may be unaware—uncertainty prevents definitive conclusion but doesn't prove unawareness). Searched for contradictions below executive visibility: Contradictions affect executive-level decisions directly (territory sizing executive decision, compensation expense executive budget item, pipeline value executive visibility, margin management executive/Board oversight, customer strategy executive/Board domain, external guidance CFO/CEO commitment), contradictions not buried in operational details invisible to executives—contradictions surface in domains executives own and govern, executive awareness of domains makes contradiction awareness likely even if contradiction resolution absent. Searched for recent awareness and response: Walk away policy Q4 2024 and sales refresh Q3 2024 represent recent interventions (both 2024, recent relative to three CEO tenures 2022-2025), but interventions reactive to consequences (margin erosion, sales performance) not to contradiction awareness (validation gap recognition, data quality issue acknowledgment, information architecture diagnosis), interventions address symptoms not root causes suggesting awareness of problems (margin, performance) not awareness of contradictions (profitability triple truth, CRM inaccuracy, validation gap architecture). No evidence of recent contradiction discovery triggering governance or infrastructure initiatives (no data governance announcement following analysis or audit discovering contradictions, no measurement infrastructure projects announced, no CRM quality programs launched after contradiction recognition). Searched for awareness-resolution connection: Margin erosion Q1-Q3 2024 visible to executives through quarterly financial performance per Stage 5, walk away policy Q4 2024 reactive to erosion per Stage 7.1, pattern shows awareness of problem (margins) triggers intervention (policy), but intervention addresses symptom (CEO deal review) not cause (CRM validation gap, profitability triple truth, information architecture), suggests executives aware of performance problem not contradiction architecture—executives may recognize margins eroding without diagnosing that margin erosion caused by profitability truth contradictions enabling unprofitable deals to progress T0-T2 unchallenged. Organizational capability for resolution exists (standard data governance, measurement infrastructure, validation processes, coordination mechanisms—all standard organizational practices not extraordinary capabilities), but capability not applied across three CEO tenures (if awareness drove resolution, capability exists to resolve, lack of resolution suggests either awareness absent OR awareness present but resolution not prioritized—cannot distinguish from evidence).
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.evidence_found: PARTIAL DISCONFIRMATION of complete unawareness, but NOT FULL DISCONFIRMATION of contradiction finding. Evidence shows PARTIAL AWARENESS: Delivery executives aware of CRM profitability gap from repeated T3 discovery (delivery knows CRM overstates because delivery discovers worse reality every deal), CFO aware of operations forecast requiring adjustment (finance adjusts, adjustment implies awareness of divergence even if adjustment methodology opaque), CEO aware of deal quality issues (walk away policy reactive to margin erosion, CEO saw problem triggering policy even if CEO may not diagnose problem as profitability truth contradiction). Evidence does NOT show COMPREHENSIVE AWARENESS or RESOLUTION TRIGGERING: Partial awareness insufficient to drive resolution—delivery knows profitability gap but delivery lacks authority to fix CRM entry per Stage 4.1, 7.5 (delivery knows problem but delivery can't resolve problem without sales cooperation and cross-functional coordination), CFO knows adjustment needed but adjustment remains opaque per Stage 7.2 (CFO awareness doesn't translate to transparent reconciliation with operations, awareness present but transparency absent), CEO knows deal quality problematic but policy reactive symptom management not proactive architecture resolution (CEO aware of margin problem, policy reviews deals individually post-signature T5, CEO may not be aware problem architectural—validation gap T0-T2, profitability triple truth, information asymmetry structure—vs operational—bad deals, sales performance, market conditions). Board awareness uncertain: Board may know or not know contradictions, uncertainty prevents conclusion Board aware or unaware, but Board resolution pressure absent (no Board data governance committee established, no Board-driven contradiction resolution initiatives visible) suggests either Board unaware OR Board aware and not prioritizing resolution. Contradictions persist across three CEO tenures despite partial awareness: Delivery awareness of profitability gap across all three CEOs (profitability validation gap structural, delivery discovers T3 every CEO tenure), yet gap persists without resolution across CEOs (awareness insufficient to drive resolution without coordination, authority, prioritization), pattern shows AWARENESS DOESN'T AUTOMATICALLY TRIGGER RESOLUTION—contradictions can persist with awareness if organizational prioritization, capability, or coordination insufficient.
disconfirming_evidence_not_found.conclusion: Organization NOT FULLY UNAWARE of contradictions but AWARENESS INSUFFICIENT TO DRIVE RESOLUTION. Evidence refutes complete unawareness hypothesis: Delivery executives aware CRM profitability gap (T3 repeated discovery creates awareness), CFO aware operations forecast requires adjustment (adjustment behavior implies awareness), CEO aware deal quality problematic (walk away policy reactive to margin erosion). Evidence does NOT support hypothesis that awareness would trigger resolution: Partial awareness exists across three CEO tenures without triggering systematic contradiction resolution (delivery knows gap but gap persists, CFO knows adjustment needed but methodology remains opaque and operations visibility uncertain, CEO knows margins problematic but policy reactive not proactive architecture resolution), awareness present but insufficient—awareness localized to functions experiencing contradictions (delivery knows profitability, CFO knows adjustment), awareness not comprehensive across executives (CRO awareness uncertain, Board awareness uncertain), awareness not translating to resolution (knowledge of problems doesn't create resolution initiatives, capability, resources, or prioritization). Contradictions PERSIST WITH PARTIAL AWARENESS indicating awareness insufficient condition for resolution: Resolution requires not just awareness but also prioritization (contradictions rise on organizational agenda above competing priorities), coordination (cross-functional collaboration to address contradictions spanning functions), authority (empowerment to change information architecture, processes, systems), capability (data governance expertise, measurement infrastructure skills, validation process design), resources (staffing, budget, executive time for contradiction resolution initiatives). Three CEO tenures pattern shows awareness existed but resolution didn't occur: If awareness sufficient, one of three CEOs with partial awareness would have resolved, persistence across CEOs indicates awareness necessary but not sufficient, other factors (prioritization, coordination, authority, capability, resources) missing preventing resolution despite partial awareness. Hypothesis that unawareness explains contradiction persistence PARTIALLY REFUTED: Some awareness exists, but hypothesis that awareness triggers resolution REFUTED—awareness present across three CEO tenures without resolution, contradictions persist with partial awareness indicating resolution requires more than awareness alone.

synthesis_notes: Three falsification attempts conducted searching for evidence contradicting CONTRADICTORY assessment. H7.7-DNF-A (contradictions superficial/reconcilable) decisively refuted: Contradictions material 13-15% profitability divergence, substantive not semantic customer count operational differences, structural satisfaction void vs external visibility asymmetry, dual data quality standard decision-critical-and-unreliable simultaneously, touch tests show major disruption required for alignment not minor clarification, three CEO tenures without reconciliation indicates substantive complexity not superficial ease. H7.7-DNF-B (contradictions being resolved) decisively refuted: No resolution initiatives across three CEO tenures 2022-2025 (no data governance, no measurement infrastructure, no reconciliation projects, no coordination mechanisms established), contradictions stable or worsening not narrowing (CRM overstatement continuing, satisfaction deteriorating 2024, ambiguity indefinite), walk away policy and sales refresh reactive symptom management not proactive contradiction resolution, no organizational commitment visible (no resources, no accountability, no Board oversight, no roadmap). H7.7-DNF-C (organization unaware, awareness would trigger resolution) partially refuted: Partial awareness exists (delivery knows profitability gap, CFO knows adjustment needed, CEO knows deal quality problematic from margin erosion), but awareness insufficient to drive resolution—contradictions persist with partial awareness across three CEO tenures indicating resolution requires prioritization, coordination, authority, capability, resources beyond awareness alone, awareness necessary but not sufficient for resolution. ANALYTICAL RIGOR: Actively sought evidence for coherence (superficial contradictions, active resolution, unawareness explaining persistence), found minimal evidence for coherence and comprehensive evidence against, falsification strengthens CONTRADICTORY assessment confidence—alternative explanations explicitly tested and refuted, remaining explanation is contradictions substantive, embedded, persistent, partially known but not prioritized for resolution, serving organizational purposes (velocity, autonomy, accountability avoidance) outweighing coherence benefits across three CEO tenures revealed organizational preference. M&A IMPLICATIONS: Falsification attempts strengthen acquirer risk assessment—contradictions not superficial reconcilable through clarification (material divergences requiring organizational change), contradictions not being actively resolved (no initiatives, stable/worsening patterns), contradictions persist despite partial awareness (awareness insufficient without prioritization/coordination/resources), acquirer must plan full contradiction resolution program post-close (governance establishment, measurement infrastructure, reconciliation processes, coordination mechanisms, cultural change—all from near-zero baseline given three CEO tenures without progress), integration complexity high from substantive contradictions requiring transformation not superficial contradictions requiring clarification, valuation uncertainty from material contradictions affecting pipeline value, customer base, margins, operational metrics all requiring independent validation given competing truths.
